Although there can be some variation with the order of components (due to syntax), typically components appear in a rather consistent order. Choose from the word bank below to create a logically written Can-Do Statement which has all the necessary components in a logical order.

NOTE: there is more than one correct response

Word bank:

a friend       a stranger    in the school     using connected sentences    directions

using original questions        interview           narrate        about their family traditions
